translation.en: [TV announcer 1] It's that special time of year, the holidays,
where we gather together with the people we love and eat so much food.
translation.it: in cui ci riuniamo con i nostri cari e ci abbuffiamo.

translation.en: This is making me so hungry. Maybe there's something else on.
translation.it: Mi sta facendo venir fame. Cambia canale.

translation.en: [Mochi] Yeah.
[TV announcer 2] It isn't a real holiday if you don't have tasty, delicious food.
translation.it: E le festività non possono chiamarsi tali senza cibo.

translation.en: [TV announcers 3, 4 and 5] Look at-- …all-- …this-- …tasty-- …food.
But, Moch, our ice is all we've got while the store's on holiday vacation.
translation.it: Abbiamo solo del ghiaccio e il supermarket è chiuso.

translation.en: -Who could that be? -[murmurs] I don't know.
-[cell phone beeps] -Hi, Steve.
Happy holidays, Waffles and Mochi!
Check it out!
I'm cooking up a batch of Steve's famous latkes over here for Hanukkah.
translation.it: Sto facendo le famose frittelle di Steve per l'Hanukkah.

translation.en: How's your holiday going?
Uh, our holiday?
-[whispers] We don't have a holiday. -[murmurs]
What's your holiday called?
-[both] Hm… -Oh, our holiday?
Uh, it's called Free…
Freezie Day?
-Yeah. Huh? -[Steve] Freezie Day!
I bet you two stellar chefs are cooking up a huge Freezie Day feast!
translation.it: Scommetto che voi due, chef stellari, preparerete delle prelibatezze.

translation.en: Well, where do I even start? Hm… There's so much food. Too much, actually.
translation.it: Beh, che dire? Ci sarà un sacco di cibo. Troppo.

translation.en: I wish you could come over and eat all this food.
Really? You mean that? This is so exciting!
Uh, Steve?
[Waffles] Who could that be?
Happy Freezie Day!
Now, where's all the tasty food?
-How on earth did you even-- -Oh, you must be Waffles and Mochi!
translation.it: - Come hai fatto a... - Finalmente ci conosciamo.

translation.en: -Huh? -I'm Broomhilda, Steve's partner.
He has told me all about the food that you have prepared for…
translation.it: Mi ha detto che avete preparato un sacco di cibo per...

translation.en: Oh, what's it called?
[chuckles] Freezie Day!
Don't worry, Steve Jr., the food will be out soon.
translation.it: Tranquillo, Steve Jr., il cibo arriverà.

translation.en: -[whispers] Mochi, can I talk to you? -Uh-huh. [murmurs]
Mochi, we don't have any food.
Freezie Day isn't a real holiday without food. What do we do, Moch?
translation.it: Che Giorno ghiacciato è senza cibo? Che si fa, Moch?

translation.en: Yeah. You're right, Mochi.
If we give our guests a great big holiday feast,
maybe we can make Freezie Day a real holiday!
translation.it: Giorno ghiacciato sarà una vera festa!

translation.en: Let's make this dinner happen. Take the Magicart and bring back holiday foods.
translation.it: Faremo la cena. Vai a fare la spesa col Magicarrello.

translation.en: -I'll keep them distracted. -[murmurs]
But remember, you gotta be back before the sun goes down.
translation.it: Ma ricorda: devi tornare prima del tramonto.

translation.en: It's a holiday, not a holi-night.
translation.it: È un giorno, non una notte di festa.

translation.en: Let's go in three, two…
-[Mochi murmurs] -…blast off!
[kids] Waffles and Mochi's Holiday Feast.
translation.it: WAFFLES + MOCHI: UNA FESTA TUTTA NUOVA

translation.en: I've heard of a ton of holidays that happen around this time of year
translation.it: Ci sono tante feste per il solstizio d'inverno,

translation.en: for winter solstice, but never Freezie Day!
translation.it: Ci sono tante feste per il solstizio d'inverno, ma Giorno ghiacciato mi è nuovo!

translation.en: What's winter solstice? It's the shortest day and the longest night of the year. Let me explain.
translation.it: Il solstizio d'inverno è il giorno con la notte più lunga dell'anno.

translation.en: See the position of the Earth, how it's tilted while it orbits the sun?
translation.it: La Terra si inclina mentre ruota intorno al Sole.

translation.en: That's what gives us seasons!
So every year around December 21st, the position of the Earth means half of our planet experiences winter,
translation.it: Ogni anno, quando su metà Terra è inverno,

translation.en: making it the shortest daytime of the year!
translation.it: il 21 è il giorno più corto.

translation.en: But here's the coolest part.
When it's the shortest day of the year here, it's the longest day of the year here,
translation.it: Quando qui è il giorno più corto, qui è quello più lungo,

translation.en: AKA it's summer.
That's right. Down Under, Christmas is a summer holiday.
translation.it: Esatto, in Australia, Natale è una festa estiva.

translation.en: So right now, it's summer and winter at the same time!
translation.it: Quindi al momento, è estate e inverno allo stesso tempo.

translation.en: -[murmurs] -[Magicart] For thousands of years, civilizations around the world have celebrated winter solstice
translation.it: Il mondo festeggia il solstizio d'inverno da migliaia di anni

translation.en: because the sun and seasons are so important to our food and lives.
translation.it: perché il sole e le stagioni generano cibo e vita.

translation.en: -[murmurs] -[Magicart] Right! Our mission.
You need to bring back food for a Freezie Day Feast before sundown,
translation.it: Devi trovare cibo prima del tramonto

translation.en: and I know just the winter holiday for you.
translation.it: e ho la festa invernale giusta per te,

translation.en: Makahiki.
[Magicart laughs] Yep, this is winter in Hawaii.
Makahiki is an indigenous Hawaiian holiday feast that lasts…
translation.it: Makahiki è una festa indigena hawaiana che dura...

translation.en: wait for it…
four months!
I know just the person for you to meet.
translation.it: Ho la persona giusta per te.

translation.en: My chef friend, Kimi Swimmy, knows all about Makahiki.
translation.it: La chef Kimi Swimmy sa tutto sul Makahiki.

translation.en: -[Magicart] Aloha Hawaii! -[Mochi cheers]
Okay, Mochi, aim for Kimi's boogie board!
-Who are you? -[murmurs] My name's Mochi!
Hi, Mochi!
Oh, we're gonna go celebrate Makahiki today. I'm getting fish for it.
translation.it: Sto proprio pescando il pesce per il Makahiki.

translation.en: [Kimi] There's a bunch of fish down there. We call them u'u,
translation.it: Ci sono un sacco di pesci Oo-oo quaggiù.

translation.en: and they live in these dark caves at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.it: Vivono in grotte buie in fondo all'oceano.

translation.en: And I have to hold my breath and go down,
and then that's when I'm able to take my spear and catch 'em.
translation.it: e li arpiono con la mia fiocina.

translation.en: We always want these fish to be reproducing and growing and keeping our oceans healthy.
translation.it: Ma per la salute dell'oceano, vogliamo che questi pesci si riproducano.

translation.en: -I'm only taking what I need. -[Mochi] Wow!
We're gonna go fry these up for our Makahiki feast. Wanna come?
translation.it: Ora vado a friggerli per il Makahiki. Vieni?

translation.en: [Steve] A little higher.
-[grunts] -A little lower.
A little higher.
A little lower.
-[doorbell rings] -Come in!
Happy Freezie Day!
We're hungry for fun!
I hope it's okay. I invited our friends from the store.
translation.it: Ho invitato qualcuno. Spero non ti dispiaccia.

translation.en: And we invited world-renowned chef Samin Nosrat.
translation.it: Sì, la famosa chef Samin Nosrat.

translation.en: -What? -Happy Freezie Day!
It's okay. I'm good.
Mochi, get home soon.
[Kimi] Welcome to my backyard.
-Mochi, you gonna help me cook some fish? -[murmurs] Yeah!
translation.it: - Mochi, mi aiuti a cucinare? - Sì!

translation.en: So, a lot of times, people eat fish as fish fillets,
translation.it: Spesso la gente mangia il pesce sfilettato,

translation.en: where they're just in these rectangles and they don't have any skins or bones,
translation.it: trasformato in rettangoli privi di lische e pelle.

translation.en: but we cook them whole.
So you're always gonna remember that it's a fish.
translation.it: Non si deve mai dimenticare che è un pesce.

translation.en: [Kimi] Mochi, while I finish up, why don't you help the kids make some poi?
translation.it: Aiuti i bambini a preparare il poi mentre io cucino?

translation.en: Poi is mashed kalo that you pound with this kind of rock.
translation.it: Il poi è taro lesso e pestato con questa specie di pietra.

translation.en: [Kimi] Come eat, everybody.
Oh, wow! Everybody's hungry! [laughs]
[woman] So Makahiki is all about a change of season.
translation.it: Makahiki celebra il cambio di stagione.

translation.en: We celebrate the land's abundance to feed us.
translation.it: Celebriamo la natura che ci dà cibo e sostentamento.

translation.en: Hawaiians like to eat.
Who doesn't like to eat?
There's just something really special about eating close to home
translation.it: Mangiare i prodotti della propria terra,

translation.en: and only taking what you need
because that's how you take care of your home.
There's a bite of fish if you want.
-[Mochi murmurs and purrs] -[Kimi] What do you think?
That's really what we're celebrating when we celebrate Makahiki.
Food and the land and the community.
translation.it: Il cibo, la terra e la comunità.

translation.en: And that's worth celebrating, don't you think?
translation.it: Ciò per cui val la pena vivere.

translation.en: [Kimi] That's right, Mochi.
If you take care of the food, the food will take care of you.
translation.it: Se proteggi il cibo, il cibo protegge te.

translation.en: Hey, Mochi, wanna play a game?
-[all chant] Go, Mochi! -[Mochi cheers]
[woman] Here you go, Mochi. Now you're part of the ohana.
translation.it: Ecco qua, Mochi. Ora fai parte dell'ohana.

translation.en: That means family.
Ah no, who could that be?
Happy Freezie Day!
Busy, you're here too?
Well, I'm famished, but where's all the food?
translation.it: Sì, e ho fame. Allora, che si mangia?

translation.en: Hello, Steve. Hello, Samin.
So, Waffles, tell me all about your menu inspiration.
translation.it: Parlami del menù che hai concepito.

translation.en: I wanna know everything about this party.
-Uh… -You must have been cooking for days!
translation.it: Tu e Mochi avrete cucinato per giorni!

translation.en: Hey, everyone! Look what I found!
It's a snow cone maker!
[gasps] No, Steve, don't flip the switch!
Flipping the switch!
-[snowblower beeps] -That's our snowblower.
Guys, I just need to turn this thing off quick. [grunts]
-[Waffles] I'm okay. -[doorbell rings]
Hello!
It's Tracee Ellis Ross!
-Hi, everyone! Hi! -Hi, Tracee!
Shelfie invited me. We're in yoga class together.
translation.it: Mi ha invitato Menso-Lia. Facciamo yoga insieme.

translation.en: Did I miss Freezie Day?
Your timing, like your talent, is impeccable, Tracee.
We're just about to eat snow cones.
Ooh, well, I can't say no cone to a snow cone.
Help! Mochi!
-[horn honks] -Mochi, say aloha. We gotta jet!
Take as much poi as you need and anything else you want.
translation.it: Prendi il poi e tutto il cibo che vuoi.

translation.en: [all] Aloha, Mochi!
[Waffles] I hope that's Mochi and the food.
-[gasps] Baker! -Hey!
Happy Freezie Day!
Happy Freezie Day!
Hey, guess what I brought?
Oh yes! Is that what I think it is?
[baker] Our friends the Pupcakes, of course!
Oh, the Pupcakes. [chuckles nervously]
Yay, even more mouths to feed. Cool.
I knew you would be so happy.
[sighs] I think I better call Mochi.
Moch, where's the food?
-Fresh Hawaiian poi? -[murmurs] Yeah.
Well, that sounds like an amazing holiday food,
but we have way more guests than we thought.
We're gonna need even more food for our Freezie Day dinner.
translation.it: Ci serve più cibo per la nostra cena.

translation.en: Well, since it's the winter solstice, we could go to Sweden for Saint Lucy's Day,
translation.it: Possiamo andare in Svezia per la festa di Santa Lucia

translation.en: or we could go to Guatemala for Fiesta de Santo Tomás,
translation.it: o in Guatemala per la Fiesta de Santo Tomás,

translation.en: or China for Dongzhi, or…
translation.it: o in Cina per il Dongzhi.

translation.en: Wait! I know where we should go to top off your Freezie Day feast.
translation.it: Anzi, no! So dove troveremo il cibo.

translation.en: [screams] Norway!
The Sámi people there celebrate Juovllat,
a cozy holiday when families gather to sing and eat special foods they've saved all winter.
translation.it: una festa per la famiglia in cui si mangiano cibi invernali.

translation.en: Let's go see my friend Maret in Norway. She's a reindeer herder.
translation.it: Andiamo da Maret, la mia amica allevatrice di renne.

translation.en: She can hook you up with food for your Freezie Day dinner.
translation.it: Lei ti darà il cibo che ti serve.

translation.en: Well, just get back with lots of food, okay? Before sundown.
translation.it: Ti prego, torna col cibo prima del tramonto.

translation.en: -Hurry, Moch! -[murmurs]
[Magicart] To Norway, Mochi! Hallo!
Landing in Norway!
Brace for impact!
[murmurs] My name is Mochi!
[murmurs] Bye-bye!
[Maret] Sorry about that.
That was my reindeer, Missy.
translation.it: Lei è Missy, la mia renna.

translation.en: Today is the Juovllat.
[murmurs] Juovllat?
You have to celebrate the Juovllat with us.
Do you know how to drive the snowmobile?
Let's go to get something to eat.
Do you like pancakes?
For our holiday, Juovllat, we make Sami pancakes.
translation.it: Per il Juovllat, facciamo i pancake Sami.

translation.en: -Okta. -One.
-Guokte. -Two.
-Golbma. -Three.
-Njeallje. -Four.
-Vihtta. -Five.
-[Maret] Get some sugar. -[murmurs]
-And some milk too. -[murmurs]
-Wheat flour. -[murmurs]
-You have some reindeer blood. -[Mochi] Oh!
[Maret] Sámi people eat reindeer because reindeer eat lichen under the snow
translation.it: I Sami mangiano le renne perché le renne mangiano licheni

translation.en: which gives us vitamins we can't get in winter without them.
translation.it: che contengono le vitamine di cui siamo carenti in inverno.

translation.en: We take care of reindeer, and they take care of us.
translation.it: Noi ci prendiamo cura delle renne e loro si prendono cura di noi.

translation.en: [Waffles] Come on, Moch. Where are you?
Hey, Waffles, come listen to Samin.
In Iran, we have a holiday called Yalda.
translation.it: In Iran c'è una festa chiamata Yalda.

translation.en: It's a winter celebration that dates back 2500 years.
translation.it: È una festa invernale che risale a 2.500 anni fa.

translation.en: Let me show you. These are some of my favorite foods we eat.
translation.it: Questi sono i miei piatti preferiti.

translation.en: -There's watermelon. -Look delicious.
[Samin] And pomegranates.\
All night long, Waffles,
all we do is eat and eat and eat.
translation.it: - non si fa che mangiare. - Bello.

translation.en: -Just like we're gonna do here tonight. -Yes!
Freezie Day will never be real without some food.
translation.it: Senza cibo, non sarà una vera festa.

translation.en: If you'll excuse me. [grunts]
-[Tracee] So cool. -[pants]
-[Mochi murmurs] -Mochi, are you on your way?
What? You are still in Norway?
-[Pupcake barks] -[whispers] You're still in Norway?
Oh, Mrs. O's calling. She'll know what to do.
translation.it: La sig.ra Obama saprà cosa fare.

translation.en: Happy Freezie Day, Waffles!
-What? How did you know? -Shelfie told me all about it.
translation.it: - Come lo sa? - Me l'ha detto Menso-Lia.

translation.en: How's the dinner?
Great.
Except for the food.
Look, can I tell you something, Waffles?
Our Christmas turkey didn't go as planned either.
translation.it: Neanche il mio tacchino di Natale è stato un successo.

translation.en: I burned it.
-You did? -Yeah, but that's okay.
translation.it: - Ah sì? - Sì, ma non importa.

translation.en: We're having fun together.
-Mm-hmm. -Oh, is that Mrs. O?
-Happy Freezie Day! Mrs. O, everybody! -[Samin] Hi, Mrs. O!
translation.it: - Felice Giorno ghiacciato a tutti! - Salve, signora!

translation.en: You guys singing any good Freezie Day songs?
translation.it: Avete delle canzoni di Giorno ghiacciato?

translation.en: [laughs] There are so many.
translation.it: Avete delle canzoni di Giorno ghiacciato? Ne ho tante.

translation.en: I'd love to sing, but we don't have a piano.
translation.it: Le canterei, ma non ho il piano.

translation.en: Oh, I do.
[strains] You have a piano?
[Busy] Of course she does. She's Tracee Ellis Ross!
translation.it: Ovvio che ce l'ha, è Tracee Ellis Ross!

translation.en: A true artiste.
You're putting a lot of pressure on me, Busy.
translation.it: Ora mi sento un po' sotto pressione.

translation.en: Teach us a Freezie Day song, won't you, Waffles?
translation.it: Insegnaci la canzone di Giorno ghiacciato.

translation.en: -[Busy] Yes, Waffles. -Uh… Ooh…
Go, Waffles, go! Teach us a good song.
-[piano plays] -Here goes nothing.
-♪ Today's the day we celebrate ♪ -Oh…
translation.it: Oggi è il giorno in cui festeggiamo

translation.en: ♪ There's dinner plates It's Freezie Day ♪
translation.it: La cena è pronta È il Giorno ghiacciato

translation.en: -I love it! -Me too.
♪ And we will eat ♪
A feast?
-Yeah, we'll eat a traditional feast. -[Tracee] So sweet!
-♪ It's Freezie Day ♪ -♪ Freezie Day ♪
translation.it: - Oggi è il Giorno ghiacciato - Giorno ghiacciato

translation.en: Oh! I love it!
-[Shelfie] Yeah. -So good.
[sighs] Mochi, I'm counting on you, bud.
translation.it: Mochi, conto su di te, amico mio.

translation.en: [Maret] Our traditional place to cook is the lavvu.
-I'm making blood pancakes on the fire. -Oh…
translation.it: Sto facendo i pancake al sangue di renna.

translation.en: [Maret] And then we add the cloudberry jam.
translation.it: Ora aggiungo la marmellata di camemoro.

translation.en: [Maret] Cloudberries are a golden berry we love to pick in the summertime.
translation.it: I camemori sono delle more gialle che raccogliamo in estate.

translation.en: -We have made a gift for you. -[murmurs]
Mochi! We gotta get back to Waffles and Freezie Day!
Wait! Before you go, I have made some of my cloudberry jam for you.
translation.it: Aspetta, prendi la mia marmellata di camemoro.

translation.en: Bye-bye!
Let's let Waffles know the good news!
translation.it: Diamo a Waffles la buona notizia!

translation.en: Wow, Moch, you got cloudberry jam in Norway?
-[murmurs] -Yay, you saved our holiday!
When will you be home? The sun is gonna set any minute now.
translation.it: Quando vieni? Il sole sta per tramontare.

translation.en: We need to serve Freezie Day dinner before the sun goes down.
We're on our way, Waffles! Nothing can stop us now.
translation.it: Stiamo arrivando! Niente ci può fermare.

translation.en: Just gotta get through this tiny blizzard up ahead, and then we're cool.
translation.it: Dobbiamo solo attraversare una bufera di neve.

translation.en: -[murmurs] -Did you say tiny blizzard?
Yeah, but it's nothing ol' Magicart can't handle!
[Magicart screams] Look out!
[Magicart screams] Look out!
Mochi, Magicart, are you there?
-[Magicart] Look out! -[both scream]
Oh no. No, no, no. The sun.
Oh no.
Oh no, Mochi, the sun went down!
We failed! [cries]
You doing okay?
Of course. Don't I look like I'm okay?
To be honest, no, not really.
translation.it: A dire il vero, no, non proprio.

translation.en: Baker,
can I tell you something? Yeah, always.
translation.it: - Posso dirti una cosa? - Sì, certo.

translation.en: Freezie Day isn't real.
Mochi and I made it up.
The truth is we have no holiday, no food,
and now Mochi and Magicart are caught in a blizzard. [squeals]
translation.it: e ora Mochi è bloccato nella bufera.

translation.en: Come here.
-[cries] -Come here.
I know. Come here.
-It's time you told everyone the truth. -[sniffles]
translation.it: Credo sia ora che tu lo dica a tutti.

translation.en: [Mochi murmurs] We did it!
We did make it! We survived!
What in the…
Something's coming up beside us.
And then you, Samin, you were so excited.
Then the Pupcakes came and they were all over the place.
And one thing led to another and…
There is no Freezie Day!
What?
Wait, so am I not really here?
Is this a dream? Am I in a simulation?
[all] Mochi!
Oh, Mochi, so glad you're back safe.
translation.it: Che bello che sei sano e salvo!

translation.en: But the jig is up. They know Freezie Day isn't real.
translation.it: Ma ormai la farsa è finita.

translation.en: Sorry.
So the holidays aren't just about food.
translation.it: Quindi le feste non sono solo per mangiare.

translation.en: -Exactly. -Yeah.
They're about, you know, being with family and friends.
translation.it: Sono fatte per stare con amici e parenti.

translation.en: And singing songs and playing games.
And more than that, they're about the universal traditions
that have been bringing humans together since the dawn of time.
translation.it: in cui gli umani si riuniscono.

translation.en: But also, there's food, right? [laughs]
Well, the sun went down though.
translation.it: Sì, ma il sole è tramontato.

translation.en: You know, not to bring up my super cool holiday again,
translation.it: Non per citare di nuovo le mie tradizioni,

translation.en: but Yalda actually starts after the sun goes down.
translation.it: ma la festa di Yalda comincia proprio dopo il tramonto.

translation.en: -[gasps] -And it goes all night long.
translation.it: ma la festa di Yalda comincia proprio dopo il tramonto. E dura tutta la notte.

translation.en: All night long?
Moch, do you know what this means?
Freezie Day can still happen!
Hit it, Tracee.
-♪ Today's the day ♪ -Oh.
♪ We celebrate with all our friends And eat real late ♪
translation.it: In cui celebriamo i nostri amici E mangiamo tardi

translation.en: [all] ♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
♪ And we will cook a traditional feast ♪
[Steve] ♪ We'll whisk and chop And use other techniques! ♪
[all] ♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
Mochi, look! Freezie Day is real.
We made our own holiday tradition.
We're singing, we're cooking,
and we're up way past our bedtime.
translation.it: e resteremo svegli fino a tardi.

translation.en: Who wants snow cones? [all] Me!
♪ A special time to be together ♪
translation.it: Una festa per stare tutti insieme

translation.en: ♪ You can feel the magic in the air ♪
translation.it: C'è un'atmosfera magica È un giorno perfetto

translation.en: ♪ See the smiles around the table ♪
♪ A time to give and a time to share ♪
translation.it: È un giorno in cui ci si scambia affetto

translation.en: ♪ There's traditions we observe ♪
♪ Like sweet jam we preserved ♪
translation.it: Come la marmellata di more squisite

translation.en: ♪ And there's my favorite treat That I love to serve ♪
translation.it: E c'è il mio dolce preferito

translation.en: ♪ A berry-topped snow cone ♪
translation.it: La granita ai frutti di bosco

translation.en: ♪ And that's where we'll begin ♪
♪ Yeah, everything tastes better ♪
♪ When you're with your friends ♪
[all] ♪ Today's the day ♪
♪ We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates ♪
translation.it: In cui far festa Con il cuore, la bocca e la testa

translation.en: ♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
♪ We sing and laugh ♪
♪ There's lots to eat ♪
♪ We'll have leftovers for weeks ♪
♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
♪ Today's the day ♪
♪ We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates ♪
translation.it: In cui far festa Con il cuore, la bocca e la testa

translation.en: ♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
♪ We sing and laugh ♪
♪ There's lots to eat ♪
♪ We'll have leftovers for weeks ♪
♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
♪ Today's the day ♪
♪ We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates ♪
translation.it: In cui far festa Con il cuore, la bocca e la testa

translation.en: ♪ It's Freezie Day ♪
♪ We sing and laugh ♪
♪ There's lots to eat We'll have leftovers for weeks ♪
-♪ It's Freezie Day ♪ -♪ Oh, it's Freezie Day ♪
I hope they ask us to clean up!
translation.it: Spero che ci chiedano di pulire!

translation.en: [all] ♪ Freezie Day ♪
Until next Freezie Day, everyone!
See you next year!
[all] ♪ Freezie Day ♪
